pages.text: <li>extracts <l>(misc/resources#dna)DNA</l> from organisms<li>consumes 1 set of <l>(misc/crafting_material#labware)Labware</l> per 10 runs on average<li>the gauge on the left is the internal power storage<li>the gauge on the right is internal DNA tank<li>items can be inserted from every side<li>extracted DNA will be automatically outputted
